title: The Open window
brief_description: Made with the assistance of Procine S.P.R.L., Brussels, Crown Film Unit and les Films d’Ariel, Paris; this film is devised as a camera impression of the landscape painting of these countries, selected from the works of their greatest painters. The painters whose work are included are Avercamp, Bonington, Bosche, Boudin, Bouts, Broughel, Claude, Constable, Corot, Courbet, Crome, Cuyp, David, De Keuninck, De Leyde, Fragonard, Grimmer, Hobbema, Huet, Jordaens, de Koninck, lancret, Manet, Memling, Michel, Millet, Monet, Wilson, Patenier, Potter, Poussin, Rembrandt, Renior, Rousseau, Rubens, Ruysdael, Stubbs, Turner, Van de Velde, Van Goyen, Verneer and Watteau.
